dialog_lines.line: Welcome to Gullmore Crossing! We appreciate the fur delivery from Shrimpsburg.
Since you're not from these parts, can I interest you in some work? We need someone to transport funds back home to Turtleton.
It looks like the promised upgrade to your boat is complete, so I can help find some additional crew for the journey.
The additional crew should help fend off any pirates roving the trade route. There's also a segull problem right now... It's that time of year...
I'll get the funds brought out for your crew to load up before you leave. Good luck!
